categoryBlurb: Home goods are some of the more challenging items to afford for new homeowners and their friends and family. Don’t bring another houseplant to the housewarming party -- get everyone together and congratulate the new homeowners with gifts they’ll really use and love! We have the hottest new home items, from Roombas to beautiful, unique decor.

productList.productName: First Alert Waterproof Fire Safe with Digital Lock, 1.31 Cu. Ft.
productList.productDescription:
The First Alert waterproof fire safe helps protect valuables from fire, theft and water damage. This fire safe has concealed hinges, which prevent burglars from prying it open. It also has a programmable digital lock. The solid steel bolts provide extra security. The fireproof safe can withstand an external temperature of up to 1700° Fahrenheit for an hour. Its watertight seal prevents water from seeping inside and keeps the contents dry. This safe floats in water, making it easy to locate. You can use the anti-theft fire safe for storing valuables, paper documents and electronic media components like DVDs and CDs. It comes with an override key to open it if you forget the pass code or if the battery goes dead. It has an adjustable and removable shelf, a door pouch and key rack. This 1-hour fire safe has a capacity of 1.3 cubic feet.





  • Features: Fireproof, Waterproof




  • Frame Material: Plastic




  • Door Thickness: 95.0 mm.




  • Lock Type: Electronic Lock




  • Number of Locking Bolts: 4




  • Maximum Temperature Rating: 1700 Degree F at 60 Minutes




  • Maximum Burn Time: 60 Minutes




  • Number of Shelves: 1




  • Care and Cleaning: Wipe Clean With a Damp Cloth




  • Dimensions: 19.0 " H x 20.0 " W x 18.0 " D 




  • Safe Exterior Dimensions: 18.0 " H x 17.5 " W x 19.63 " D 




  • Safe Interior Dimensions: 13.63 " H x 13.25 " W x 12.5 " D 




  • Safe Interior Volume: 1.3 Cu. Ft.




  • Weight: 99.0 Lb.




  • Battery Required, included: 4 AA

productList.productName: Whynter ARC-10WB 10,000 BTU Portable Air Conditioner
productList.productDescription:
The Whynter ARC-10WB air conditioner has a 10,000 BTU cooling capacity and provides airflow of about 380 CFM. It operates at 3 cooling speeds and 4 fan speeds. This air conditioner distributes cool air evenly while in oscillating mode and the dehumidification mode removes excess moisture from the air. The self-evaporating technology uses the moisture gathered to generate cool air. This remote-conrol air conditioner has a washable and removable filter. Ideal for 100-300 square feet rooms. Mounting hardware included.





  • Cooling Output: 10000 BTU




  • Room Size: 100-300 sq. ft.




  • Airflow (CFM): 380




  • Features: Self-evaporative System, Removable Filter, Automatic Restart, Programmable Timer, Oscillating, Digital Temperature Control, Dehumidification Mode




  • Includes: Extended Window Exhaust Kit, Exhaust Hose, Remote, Wheels, Mounting Hardware




  • Number of Cooling Speeds: 3




  • Number of Fan Speeds: 4




  • Finish: Smooth




  • Amps Required: 9.500




  • Volts Required: 115.000




  • Safety and Security Features: Auto Shutoff




  • Cable/Cord Length: 5.000L




  • Battery required, included: 2 alkaline AAA




  • Assembly Details: assembly required

productList.productName: Threshold™ Blake 4-Piece Metal Woven Strap Patio Conversation Set
productList.productDescription:
Contemporary design combines with high value in this Threshold Blake, 4-Piece Metal Woven Strap Patio Conversation Set. The fashionable and powder-coated aluminum frame patio chairs have a slight recline to meet your comfort needs whether relaxing in the sun or visiting with guests in the shade. Woven straps and polyester-filled cushions support and cradle your body for ultimate comfort. The large patio coffee table with tempered glass top holds your sunscreen, a cool drink and a tasty snack for your guests. The all-weather construction and rust-resistant materials mean you'll have the pleasure of enjoying this patio furniture season after season. Includes 2 patio armchairs, patio loveseat and patio coffee table. Some assembly required.





  • Includes: 1 patio loveseat, 2 patio arm chairs, 1 patio coffee table




  • Warranty: 1 Year Limited Manufacturer Warranty




  • Assembly Details: assembly required, tools provided




  • Seating Capacity: 4




  • Care and Cleaning: Wipe Clean with a Damp Cloth




  • Protective Qualities: Weather-resistant, Rust-resistant




  • Number of Pieces: 4




  • Patio Loveseat : 1 pc , Steel, Sling, E-Coating, Powder-coated, Includes: Back Pillows, Seat Cushions

  • Overall Dimensions: 33.5 " H x 26.25 " W x 30.5 " D , Seat Dimensions: 13.3 " H x 21.85 " W x 23.9 " D , Weight: 31.02 Lb., Weight Capacity: 225.0 Lb.

productList.productName: Garden Sun Tall Propane Patio Heater with Table - Hammered Silver
productList.productDescription:
When the cool evenings come, don’t stop your outdoor activity. This outdoor propane heater is all that you need to keep entertaining outdoors year round. Not only does this tall outdoor heater give you 10-12’ dia. of warmth, it also provides you with an extra table for your patio area. The table is adjustable and can also be completely removed when not in use. Steel construction ensures that unit is durable as well as functional. Made of heavy-duty steel, projecting 41,000 BTUs of heat in a circle.





  • Features: Weighted Base




  • Power Source: Propane




  • Heat Output: 41000 BTU




  • Heat Coverage: 6' Radius




  • Frame Material: Steel




  • Metal Finish: Silver




  • Finish: Powder-Coated




  • Protective Qualities: Weatherproof




  • Safety and Security Features: Safety Certified

productList.productDescription:
A portable speaker delivers deep, unexpected full sound from an incredibly compact source. Small enough to fit into your hand, the SoundLink® Mini speaker connects wirelessly to your Bluetooth device so you can play your tunes or videos anywhere. The included charging cradle serves as a home base and lets you grab your speakers and go. A durable build of one-piece anodized aluminum is engineered to be sleek yet durable, while the rechargeable lithium-ion battery provides up to seven hours of play time.



  • Includes charging cradle.

  • Connects to any Bluetooth-enabled device.

  • Aluminum housing.

  • By Bose®; imported.
productList.productMetaDescription: music lovers. wedding. new house. wireless.

productList.productDescription:
Feeling overwhelmed by household tasks? Need a helping hand? How about a robot that does the vacuuming for you? Meet the iRobot® Roomba® 650 Vacuum Cleaning Robot, a state-of-the-art home appliance that might just change your life. Roomba’s patented three-stage cleaning system removes dirt, dust and other debris, automatically adjusting to carpets, hardwood, tile and linoleum as it moves through your home. AeroVac technology maximizes air flow through the cleaning head, pulling hair and dust off the brushes and into the bin. A larger-than-ever bin means less frequent emptying, and longer-lasting brushes mean easier maintenance. Impressed yet? Wait ’til you hear this: Roomba’s iAdapt Responsive Navigation Technology ensures that your robot cleans every corner of your room multiple times, even the hard-to-reach spots. Meanwhile, its Dirt Detect technology uses an acoustic sensor to identify the dirtiest areas, instructing the robot to spend more time there. Roomba can be scheduled to clean up to seven times per week, even when you’re not home. A Virtual Wall confines the robot to specific rooms, and when it’s finished cleaning, it automatically returns to its Home Base to recharge.  Just press “Clean” and let Roomba take care of the rest!


 





  • Roomba 650 picks up an amazing amount of dirt, pet hair and other debris with its patented 3 stage cleaning system




  • Dirt Detect technology employs an acoustic sensor to identify dirtier areas and spends more time cleaning them




  • iAdapt™ is an advanced system of software and sensors that ensures Roomba vacuums every section of your room and cleaning areas you cannot easily reach




  • The included Virtual Wall keeps Roomba cleaning where you need it and blocks off-limit areas




  • The robot can be scheduled to perform up to seven cleaning sessions per week, even when you are not home




  • Features: Rechargable, Self Propelled, Easy Empty Dirt Container, Portable, Pet Hair Pick-Up, Cordless, Carry Handle




  • Includes: Brush Cleaning Tool, Owner's Manual, Rechargeable Battery, Charger, Home Charging Base




  • Recommended Surface Application: Hard Floor, Multi-Surface, Carpet, Hardwood




  • Filter Type: Standard




  • Number of Speeds: 1




  • Run Time: 120 minutes




  • Capacity (volume): 49.0 Cu. Cm.




  • Cleaning Path Width: 10.5 "




  • Vacuum Attachments: Car Nozzle




  • Weight: 7.9 Lb.




  • Battery: Required, included: 1 nickle metal hydride non-universal




  • Assembly Details: no assembly required

Meet the Nest Learning Thermostat. It learns from you and your home, programs itself automatically, and helps save energy when you’re away. And you can control it using your phone, tablet, or laptop.


 


In independent studies, the Nest Thermostat saved an average of 10-12% on heating bills and 15% on cooling bills.  Based on typical energy cost, that means it paid for itself in under two years.


 





  • Features: controlled by smartphone app, Backlit Display, Wireless




  • HVAC Compatibility: Central AC, Gas, Oil, Electric




  • Material: Plastic, Metal

productList.productDescription:
Create a wall of cabinetry with the look of a built-in with our Tucker Buffet. The generously scaled pieces offer ample space for organizing dining essentials.



  • 66.5" w x 16.5" d x 35" h

  • Crafted of hardwood and veneers.

  • Buffet features four dovetailed drawers that open to reveal two storage areas, each with two adjustable shelves.

  • Two cabinets feature two adjustable shelves each and a tempered-glass door.

  • Iron knobs.

  • Hand finished in Black, Mahogany or Rustic Pine.

  • Hardware finished in Antique Bronze.


Features



  • Crafted of hardwood and veneers over MDF; the tower is constructed of hardwood with hardwood veneer over MDF.

  • The top’s open wood grain has no knots, and its eased edges and thick molding provide a distinguished look.

  • Tempered glass is a safety glass that is manufactured through a process of extreme heating followed by rapid cooling, making it harder than normal glass and resistant to breakage.

  • Hand-applied finish is sealed with lacquer for durability and moisture resistance.

  • Levelers attached to the bottom of the legs ensure proper stability.

  • This furniture will be assembled in your home by our delivery team at no extra charge.


Details



  • Overall: 66.5" w x 16.5" d x 35" h

  • Door (2): 20" w x 25" h x 1" thick

  • Adjustable Shelf (2 per cabinet): 20" w x 15" d x 1" thick

  • Cabinet Interior (without adjustable shelves): 20" w x 15" d x 26" h

  • Drawer (4): 20" w x 14" d x 5" h

  • Weight: 182 lb

productList.productName: KitchenAid® Ultra Power 4.5 Qt Stand Mixer- KSM95
productList.productDescription:
The KitchenAid Ultra Power Series Tilt-Head Stand Mixer with 4.5-quart stainless steel mixing bowl and 10 speeds easily mixes, kneads and whips your favorite ingredients. For even more versatility, the power hub is designed to use the motor’s power to operate over 15 optional attachments from food grinders to pasta makers and more.


 





  • Number of Speeds: 10




  • Capacity (volume): 4.500




  • Appliance Capabilities: Whips, Mixes, Beats, Kneads, Blends




  • Features: Tilt Back Head, Removable Bowl, All Metal Drive System, Variable Speed, Adjustable Speed Control




  • Includes: Instruction Manual, Recipe Book, Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl, Flat Beaters, Dough Hooks




  • Material: Zinc, Stainless Steel




  • Finish: Painted




  • Metal Finish: Zinc




  • Protective Qualities: Shock-resistant




  • Safety and Security Features: Safety Lock, Nonslip Base




  • Care and Cleaning: Wipe Clean, Hand wash
